blend.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to combine different things in a way that produces an effective or pleasant result, or to become combined in this way
blend.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: a story that blends fact and legend
Leave the sauce to allow the flavours to blend together.
blend.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to thoroughly mix together soft or liquid substances to form a single smooth substance
blend.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Blend the sugar, eggs, and flour.
blend.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: to produce tea, tobacco, whisky etc by mixing several different types together
blend.translation[0].definitions[2].note: Blend is usually passive in this meaning
blend.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a product such as tea, tobacco, or whisky that is a mixture of several different types
blend.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: a mixture of different things that combine together well
blend.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: an excellent team, with a nice blend of experience and youthful enthusiasm
